content: Fix MODEL_PATH configuration - current path expects codellama-13b-instruct.Q4_K_M.gguf but only has Phi-3-mini-4k-instruct-q4.gguf
Fix Ollama model integration to use available models (phi4-mini, deepseek-r1, etc.) instead of missing local GGUF files
Fix memory/store endpoint validation - ensure proper error handling for missing key/value pairs
Fix missing import dependencies and circular import issues in unified_mcp_server.py
Test MCP server startup and verify all endpoints are working correctly
